integration.description: Details about any integration used by the customer.

phone.description: Phone number associated with the customer.

metadata.description: Additional information or custom data related to the customer.

domain.description: Domain or subdomain associated with the customer.

customer_code.description: Unique code assigned to identify the customer.

risk_action.description: Risk action associated with the customer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the customer record.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the customer record was created.

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the customer record was last updated.
